00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <limits>
00012 
00013 #if !defined(_WIN32) && !defined(_WIN64)
00014 #include <condition_variable>
00015 #include <mutex>

00017 
00018 namespace hope::concurrency {
00019 
00020     class synchronization_event {
00021     protected:
00022         enum class policy : unsigned {
00023             Auto,
00024             Manual,
00025         };
00026 
00027         explicit synchronization_event(policy policy) noexcept;
00028     public:
00029 
00030         ~synchronization_event() noexcept;
00031 
00032         void set() const noexcept;
00033 
00034         void reset() const noexcept;
00035 
00036         bool wait(long waiting_time = std::numeric_limits<long>::max()) const noexcept;
00037 
00038         synchronization_event(synchronization_event&&) = delete;
00039         synchronization_event(const synchronization_event&) = delete;
00040         synchronization_event& operator=(synchronization_event&&) = delete;
00041         synchronization_event& operator=(const synchronization_event&) = delete;
00042 
00043     private:
00044 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(_WIN64)
00045         using handle = void*;
00046         handle m_event;
00047 #else
00048         mutable std::condition_variable m_cv;
00049         mutable std::mutex m_mutex;
00050 #endif
00051     };
00052 
00053     class auto_reset_event final : public synchronization_event {
00054     public:
00055         explicit auto_reset_event();
00056 
00057         ~auto_reset_event();
00058 
00059         auto_reset_event(auto_reset_event&&) = delete;
00060         auto_reset_event(const auto_reset_event&) = delete;
00061         auto_reset_event& operator=(auto_reset_event&&) = delete;
00062         auto_reset_event& operator=(const auto_reset_event&) = delete;
00063     };
00064 
00065     class manual_reset_event final : public synchronization_event {
00066     public:
00067         explicit manual_reset_event();
00068 
00069         ~manual_reset_event();
00070 
00071         manual_reset_event(manual_reset_event&&) = delete;
00072         manual_reset_event(const manual_reset_event&) = delete;
00073         manual_reset_event& operator=(manual_reset_event&&) = delete;
00074         manual_reset_event& operator=(const manual_reset_event&) = delete;
00075     };
00076 }
